lead_paragraph: The problem of providing the tools with which to destroy Adolf Hitler and Nazism is a problem of transportation as well as of production. It Is not enough to turn out an ever-increasing number of tanks, airplanes and guns. Stored in warehouses and on docksides here, they would not affect the outcome of a single battle.
